sentences.sentence: They protested that there was no place for a school of commerce in their hallowed halls of learning.
sentences.translation: 他们抗议说，在他们所尊崇的学术殿堂里没有商业学院的位置。

sentences.sentence: “Our Father in heaven, hallowed by your name ….
sentences.translation: “我们在天上的父，愿人都尊你的名为圣...”

sentences.sentence: Hallowed laws, regulations, standards and memes will evaporate.
sentences.translation: 神圣不可侵犯的法规、标准和文化基因都将不复存在。
